title: Overwater Villa Getaway with All-Inclusive Dining
description: Slow down and get away from the hustle and bustle with a stunning getaway in the Maldives. The newly opened Carpe Diem Beach Resort & Spa is a gorgeous retreat on a private island fringed by swaying palm trees and surrounded by glittering turquoise waters. Feel your troubles float away as you relax in your own private overwater villa and take in gorgeous tropical views. Includes all-inclusive dining and select drinks at Acropora restaurant, return domestic plane transfers from Mal√© International Airport, a guided snorkelling tour, one sunset cocktail at Buena Vista bar and much more.
